contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Quiéry-la-Motte |region = [[Image:Blason Nord-Pas-De-Calais.svg|20px]] [[Nord-Pas-de-Calais]] |department = [[Image:Pas de Calais Arms.svg|20px]] [[Pas-de-Calais]] |arrondissement = Arras |canton = Vimy |INSEE = 62680 |postal code = 62490 |mayor = Jean-Luc Leroux |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Osartis |longitude = 2.9789 |latitude = 50.3664 |elevation m = 32 |elevation min m = 26 |elevation max m = 64 |area km2 = 8.93 |population = 763 |population date = 2006 }} '''Quiéry-la-Motte''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Pas-de-Calais]] [[Departments in France|department]] in the [[Nord-Pas-de-Calais]] region of [[France]]. ==Geography== Quiéry-la-Motte is situated {{Convert|12|mi|km|0}} northeast of Arras, at the junction of the D39 and D48 roads. The [[A1 autoroute]] passes right by the commune. ==Population== {| align="center" rules="all" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4" style="border: 1px solid #999; border-right: 2px solid #999; border-bottom:2px solid #999; background: #f3fff3" |+ style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.1em; margin-bottom: 0.5em"|Population history |-style="background: #ddffdd" ! 1962 !! 1968 !! 1975 !! 1982 !! 1990 !! 1999 !! 2006 |- | align=center| 563 || align=center| 568 || align=center| 673 || align=center| 701 || align=center| 769 || align=center| 775 || align=center| 763 |- | colspan=7 align=center| <small>Census count starting from 1962: Population without duplicates</small> |} ==Places of interest== * The church of St.Martin, dating from the seventeenth century. * A [[feudal]] [[Motte-and-bailey|motte]]. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department]] ==References== * [http://www.insee.fr/fr/methodes/nomenclatures/cog/fichecommunale.asp?codedep=62&codecom=680 INSEE commune file] {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.quierylamotte.fr/ Official website of the commune] {{Fr}} * [http://www.quid.fr/communes.html?mode=detail&id=27167&req=Quiéry-la-Motte Quiéry-la-Motte on the Quid website] {{Fr}} {{Pas-de-Calais communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Quiery-La-Motte}} [[Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais|Quierylamotte]] {{Arras-geo-stub}}
